name: The Shelter - GWJ #40
description:
A relaxing survival game, where you... - wait what?

Yes, survival, but relaxing. You are in a distant isolated island, building your dream summer holiday hut. But it's not built yet! You start with a sleeping bag, a fishing rod, axe and a campfire - and you have to make sure you won't starve to death while building everything else.

Built for the Godot Wild Jam #40

Theme: COZY

Wildcards:
- SEGAAAAA - Have a splash-screen intro with an audio jingle and logo
- NEW GAME+ - Add content that's only accessible after winning at least once
- OVERWORKED - Your characters are not machines and need occasional breaks

(Fun fact: I got an ukulele just to record the song for this game. No regrets.)

Game by Vela
Splash screen voice by JohnGabrielUK

Wood, fish and hammer icons from OpenGameArt.org
